item.title: 美联储抚慰贸易战的刺痛
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 谷物贸易商邦吉公司（Bunge）在完成 Viterra 交易后上调全年利润预期
item.description: 美国谷物贸易商和加工商邦吉公司（Bunge）周三修订了全年调整后利润预期，以反映其第三季度以 340 亿美元收购谷物装卸商 Viterra 的影响。【原文：U.S. grain trader and processor Bunge on Wednesday revised its full-year adjusted profit forecast to reflect the impact of its $34 billion acquisition of grain handler Viterra in the third quarter.】

item.title: 华尔街期货受芯片股提振上涨；银行业盈利成为焦点
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货上涨，原因是芯片制造商在ASML发布财报后反弹，而投资者则在等待美国银行和摩根士丹利的财报。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Wednesday as chipmakers rallied after ASML's results, while investors awaited earnings from Bank of America and Morgan Stanley following strong reports from lenders that helped lift markets in the prior session.】

item.title: 投资者警惕可能使人工智能列车脱轨的风险
item.description: 对人工智能盈利潜力的乐观情绪助推美国股市屡创新高，但投资者正在寻找人工智能交易中可能出现的薄弱点，并确定了一些需要警惕的风险。【原文：Optimism over the profit potential of artificial intelligence has helped drive the U.S. stock market to record highs, but investors are looking for weak spots that could emerge in the AI trade and have identified some risks to watch for.】

item.title: 马斯克为特斯拉 560 亿美元酬劳打官司进入最后阶段
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的律师将于周三敦促特拉华州最高法院恢复他从特斯拉公司获得的 560 亿美元薪酬，因为在下级法院法官撤销特斯拉首席执行官创纪录的薪酬近两年后，最大的企业法律诉讼之一进入了最后阶段。【原文：Elon Musk's lawyers will urge the Delaware Supreme Court on Wednesday to restore his $56 billion pay package from Tesla , as one of the biggest corporate legal battles enters its final stage nearly two years after a lower court judge rescinded the Tesla CEO's record compensation.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔认为飞机电子设备可改善航空供应链
item.description: 供应商霍尼韦尔公司（Honeywell）的一位高级主管告诉路透社记者，航空电子产品的生产是航空供应链中的一个亮点，而某些零部件的制造仍然面临挑战。【原文：The production of electronics for aviation is a bright spot in the aerospace supply chain, whereas manufacturing of some parts still remains challenging, a senior executive at supplier Honeywell told Reuters.】

item.title: 印度塔塔通讯公司因成本上升导致季度利润下降
item.description: 印度塔塔通讯公司（Tata Communications）周三报告称，由于支出增加抵消了数据服务业务的健康增长，该公司季度利润连续第二个季度下滑。【原文：India's Tata Communications reported a second consecutive fall in its quarterly profit on Wednesday, as higher expenses countered healthy growth in its data services business.】

item.title: Waymo 明年将在伦敦推出自动驾驶打车服务
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的机器人出租车公司 Waymo 周三表示，计划于 2026 年在伦敦推出完全无人驾驶的打车服务，并希望将业务范围扩展到国际主要城市。【原文：Alphabet's Waymo plans to launch its fully driverless ride-hailing service in London in 2026, the robotaxi firm said on Wednesday, as it looks to expand its footprint to major international cities.】

item.title: 中美贸易战笼罩港口，超级油轮运费大幅上涨
item.description: 由于中美针锋相对地提高港口费，以及担心美国对中国一个主要原油码头的制裁会产生影响，超级油轮运费本周飙升，并将继续走高。【原文：Supertanker freight rates surged this week and are set to stay elevated on U.S.-China tit-for-tat hikes in port fees and concerns about the fallout from U.S. sanctions on a major Chinese crude oil terminal.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称苹果游说印度修改阻碍其扩张的税法
item.description: 据知情人士透露，苹果公司正在游说印度政府修改所得税法，以确保该公司不会因其提供给合同制造商的高端 iPhone 机器所有权而被征税，这个问题被视为其未来扩张的障碍。【原文：Apple is lobbying India's government to modify its income tax law to ensure the company is not taxed for ownership of high-end iPhone machinery it provides to its contract manufacturers, an issue seen as a hurdle to its future expansion, sources say.】

item.title: 英国 Nscale 公司与微软签订协议，将供应 20 万颗英伟达人工智能芯片
item.description: 英国人工智能集团Nscale周三表示，它与微软签署了一项协议，将交付总计约20万颗英伟达人工智能芯片。【原文：British AI group Nscale said on Wednesday it signed a deal with Microsoft to deliver a total of about 200,000 Nvidia AI chips.】

item.title: 英国凯德公司因 2023 年网络漏洞被罚款 1900 万美元
item.description: 英国外包公司 Capita 周三表示，由于在 2023 年的一次网络攻击中未能保护个人数据，该公司被处以 1400 万英镑（约合 1870 万美元）的罚款，这是与英国隐私监管机构达成的和解协议的一部分。【原文：Capita has been fined 14 million pounds ($18.7 million) for failing to protect personal data during a 2023 cyber attack, the British outsourcing firm said on Wednesday, as part of a settlement with the UK's privacy watchdog.】

item.title: ASML 首席财务官称中国销售额下降与之前的囤货无关
item.description: ASML 财务总监罗杰-达森（Roger Dassen）周三告诉记者，ASML 预计中国销售额下降的原因并不是中国客户之前的囤货。【原文：ASML's expected decline in China sales is not due to previous stockpiling by its Chinese customers, finance chief Roger Dassen told reporters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据媒体报道，中国 Sicarrier 公司推出新型芯片设计软件
item.description: 与华为（HWT.UL）关系密切的中国芯片设备制造商思卡尔（SiCarrier）的一家子公司发布了两款用于半导体设计的国产软件产品，这是中国减少对外国技术依赖的最新举措。【原文：A subsidiary of SiCarrier, a Chinese chip equipment maker with close links to Huawei (HWT.UL), unveiled two domestically developed software products for semiconductor designs, the latest move by China to reduce reliance on foreign technologies.】

item.title: 法国 Altice 拒绝法国电信运营商联合竞购 SFR
item.description: Altice 首席执行官亚瑟-德雷福斯（Arthur Dreyfuss）周三在一份备忘录中告诉员工，电信公司 SFR 的所有者 Altice 法国公司拒绝了三家法国竞争对手收购该运营商的出价，这使得一项可能刺激欧洲电信市场进一步整合的潜在交易受挫。【原文：Altice France, the owner telecoms firm SFR, has rejected a bid from three French rivals to buy the operator, Altice CEO Arthur Dreyfuss told staff in a memo on Wednesday, setting back a potential deal that could spur more consolidation in the European telecoms market.】

item.title: Stellantis因翻车风险召回逾29.8万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，由于换挡杆拉索存在缺陷，可能导致驻车功能失效并使车辆失控，Stellantis公司将在美国召回298,439辆道奇-达特（Dodge Dart）汽车。【原文：Stellantis is recalling 298,439 Dodge Dart vehicles in the U.S. due to a shifter cable defect that could disable the park function and allow the vehicle to rollaway, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日产汽车因燃油泵问题召回17.3万多辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周三表示，由于燃油泵保险丝熔断可能导致发动机熄火，日产汽车将在美国召回173301辆汽车。【原文：Nissan is recalling 173,301 vehicles in the United States due to a potential issue with blown fuel pump fuses that can cause engine stalling, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: IDC 称中国第三季度智能手机出货量同比下降 0.6
item.description: 研究机构IDC周三发布的数据显示，中国第三季度智能手机出货量为6840万部，同比下降0.6%。【原文：China's smartphone shipments in the third quarter dipped 0.6% from a year earlier to 68.4 million units，according to data issued by research firm IDC on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国 Lendable 公司推出英国首个金融科技公司移动计划
item.description: 英国消费信贷公司 Lendable 周三推出了每月 20 英镑的移动计划，这是最新一家金融技术公司将业务扩展到电信领域，以开辟新的收入来源。【原文：British consumer credit firm Lendable launched a monthly 20-pound mobile plan on Wednesday, the latest financial technology firm to expand into telecommunications to unlock new revenue streams.】

item.title: 路威酩轩集团公布销售额增长后股价上涨 8
item.description: LMVH 周三在 Tradegate 平台上的股价上涨了近 8%，一天前该公司公布第三季度销售额增长了 1%，这是该公司今年首个实现增长的季度。【原文：LMVH shares traded nearly 8% higher on the Tradegate platform on Wednesday, a day after the company reported that sales increased by 1% in the third quarter, its first quarter of growth this year.】

item.title: 中美竞争加剧，中国将继续 "一切以生产为中心 "的经济策略
item.description: 分析人士称，随着与美国的竞争加剧，中国共产党将于本月召开会议，制定以高科技制造业为重点的五年远景规划，以寻求提升其庞大的工业，并在全球范围内展示实力。【原文：China's Communist Party meets this month to map a five-year vision that prioritises high-tech manufacturing in its quest to upgrade its sprawling industries and project global power as its rivalry with the U.S. intensifies, analysts say.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称日本乐天正考虑在美国上市信用卡业务
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，日本电子商务和金融巨头乐天公司正在考虑在美国首次公开发行其信用卡业务。【原文：Japanese e-commerce and finance heavyweight Rakuten is weighing an initial public offering in the United States of its credit card business, according to two sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 分析师称中国对与美国有关联的韩华集团实施制裁是一种警告姿态
item.description: 分析人士周三表示，中国对韩国造船企业韩华海洋（Hanwha Ocean）的五家与美国有关联的子公司实施的制裁被视为一种警告姿态，不会产生立竿见影的效果，而且中国政府不太可能通过扩大制裁范围获得多少好处。【原文：China's sanctions against five U.S.-linked affiliates of South Korean shipbuilder Hanwha Ocean are seen as a warning gesture without immediate impact, and Beijing is unlikely to gain much by expanding them, analysts said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 新加坡新法律授权委员会屏蔽有害网络内容
item.description: 根据周三提交国会的一项新法案，新加坡将成立一个新的网络安全委员会，该委员会有权命令社交媒体平台屏蔽有害帖子。【原文：Singapore will introduce a new online safety commission with powers to order social media platforms to block harmful posts, according to a new bill that was tabled in parliament on Wednesday.】

item.title: ASML 发现中国需求大幅下降，第三季度预订额高于预期
item.description: 全球最大的计算机芯片制造设备供应商阿斯麦公司（ASML）周三警告说，尽管其第三季度预订额超过了市场预测，但预计明年中国的需求将大幅下降。【原文：ASML , the world's biggest supplier of computer chip-making equipment, on Wednesday warned that it expected a significant fall in demand from China next year despite its third quarter bookings beating market forecasts.】

item.title: 印度 Bharti Airtel 与 IBM 合作拓展云服务
item.description: 印度第二大电信运营商巴蒂电信公司（Bharti Airtel）周三表示，随着计算能力需求的增长，两家公司已与 IBM 合作，通过其最近推出的云平台提供这家美国科技公司的服务。【原文：India's second-largest telecom operator Bharti Airtel has partnered with IBM to offer the American tech firm's services through its recently launched cloud platform, the companies said on Wednesday as demand for computing capacity grows.】

item.title: 美国数据黑暗阴影蔓延全球
item.description: 美国政府停摆导致官方数据无法流通，这可能会给日本和其他国家的政策制定者的视野蒙上一层阴影，因为对世界最大经济体命运的洞察力会为这些国家的货币、贸易表现和通胀前景提供参考。【原文：The U.S. government shutdown that has turned off the official flow of data could begin clouding the view for policymakers in Japan and other countries where insight into the fortunes of the world's biggest economy informs the outlook for their own currencies, trade performance and inflation.】

item.title: 中国工业部长会见苹果公司蒂姆-库克
item.description: 根据中国工业部发布的声明，中国工业部长周三在北京会见了苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克。【原文：China's industry minister met with Apple CEO Tim Cook in Beijing on Wednesday, according to a statement released by the ministry.】

item.title: 早间竞标美联储暂时重回舞台中心
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：OpenAI 制定五年计划，兑现 1 万亿美元支出承诺
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，ChatGPT 的所有者 OpenAI 正在开发新的收入来源、建立债务合作关系，并计划进一步筹集资金，作为五年战略的一部分，以支付超过 1 万亿美元的承诺支出。【原文：ChatGPT owner OpenAI is working on new revenue lines, debt partnerships and planning further fundraising as part of a five-year strategy to cover more than $1 trillion in pledged spending, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】
